26  //*******************************************************************
27  geometry_msgs::Pose list2Pose(std::vector<double> list)
28  {
29  assert( (list.size()==3) || (list.size()==6) || (list.size()==7));
30  geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
31  switch(list.size())
32  {
33  case 3: // only position
34  pose.position.x = list[0];
35  pose.position.y = list[1];
36  pose.position.z = list[2];
37  pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
38  return pose;
39  case 6: // position + Euler angle
40  pose.position.x = list[0];
41  pose.position.y = list[1];
42  pose.position.z = list[2];
43  pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(list[3],list[4],list[5]);
44  return pose;
45  case 7: // position + Quaternion
46  pose.position.x = list[0];
47  pose.position.y = list[1];
48  pose.position.z = list[2];
49  pose.orientation.x = list[3];
50  pose.orientation.y = list[4];
51  pose.orientation.z = list[5];
52  pose.orientation.w = list[6];
53  return pose;
54  }
55 
56  }
57 
58  //*******************************************************************
59  geometry_msgs::Vector3 list2Vec3(std::vector<double> list)
60  {
61  assert(list.size()==3);
62  geometry_msgs::Vector3 Vec3;
63  Vec3.x = list[0];
64  Vec3.y = list[1];
65  Vec3.z = list[2];
66  return Vec3;
67  }
68 
69  //*******************************************************************
70  moveit_msgs::ObjectColor list2Color(std::vector<double> bgra)
71  {
72  assert(bgra.size()==4);
73  moveit_msgs::ObjectColor color;
74  color.color.b = bgra[0];
75  color.color.g = bgra[1];
76  color.color.r = bgra[2];
77  color.color.a = bgra[3];
78  return color;
79  }
80 
81 } // namespace moveit_utils
